comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111103 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111103031131

Steps to reproduce:

I clicked the about link in that tells me more about what information is collected about my computer.


Actual results:

No specific information was given to me.


Expected results:

Mozilla should tell us what exact information is collected:
Like;

XCV x86 Processor III
Screen resolution: 1001x200
Ram brand: KhanStone 3.3 5GB
Satalite PCI card: StarTrek 3.1 made in USSR
USB: ScanDisk 32MB
FloppyDisk: Microsoft virtual FD 1.1
GraphicCard: Panasonic GF 3500 sp version 3
USB2: Remote Vibrator RedHole 3
SoundCard: N/A
Today used: 11 hours, 5 minutes, 59 seconds

Things like that, exact information, just one sample. When users click the "more information" button.
